text: Altaf Gauhar or sometimes written Altaf Gohar (1923-2000) was a Pakistani civil servant, journalist and writer. He is best known for having helped to write the biography of the notorious Pakistani military dictator General.Ayub Khan.Tariq Ali, Article The General in his labyrinth ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Pakistani journalists Category:Pakistani Muslims
title: Altaf Gauhar
